articles.description: Newcastle United and Liverpool is shaping up as the Premier League new toxic rivalry after a night of drama on Tyneside, says chief football writer Phil McNulty
articles.title: Is Newcastle v Liverpool the Premier League's new toxic rivalry?

articles.description: Sixteen-year-old Rio Ngumoha scores the winning goal for Liverpool against Newcastle in the Premier League, but who is he?
articles.title: Newcastle 2-3 Liverpool: Who is Rio Ngumoha?

articles.description: Britain's Cameron Norrie books his place in the second round of the US Open thanks to Sebastian Korda's retirement.
articles.title: US Open: Britain's Cameron Norrie through after Sebastian Korda retirement

articles.description: Madison Keys produced an error-strewn performance as she lost to Mexico's Renata Zarazua in the first round of the US Open.
articles.title: US Open results: Grand Slam winner Madison Keys loses in first round in New York

articles.description: Theo Walcott says 15-year-old Arsenal winger Max Dowman reminds him of Lionel Messi and is "so refreshing" to watch.
articles.title: Max Dowman: Arsenal winger plays like Lionel Messi, says former Gunners forward Theo Walcott

articles.description: Newcastle United have a £50m bid for striker Jorgen Strand Larsen rejected by Wolves as they look to sign a striker before the transfer deadline.
articles.title: Jorgen Strand Larsen: Wolves reject £50m bid from Newcastle for Norway striker

articles.description: Two-time Wimbledon champion Petra Kvitova bids an emotional farewell to tennis as she ens her illustrious career with a first-round defeat at the US Open.
articles.title: US Open 2025 results: Petra Kvitova brings career to close at Flushing Meadows with Diane Parry defeat

articles.description: After every round of Premier League matches this season, Troy Deeney gives us his team of the week. Do you agree with his choices?
articles.title: Troy Deeney's Team of the Week: Timber, Pickford, Fernandez, Guimaraes, Gyokeres, Grealish

articles.description: Nottingham Forest have a deal worth £30.2m rejected by Strasbourg for their French forward Dilane Bakwa.
articles.title: Dilane Bakwa: Nottingham Forest have deal worth £30.2m rejected by Strasbourg

articles.description: David Gaudu produces a superb sprint finish to win the third stage of the Vuelta a Espana as Jonas Vingegaard retains the overall lead.
articles.title: Vuelta a Espana: David Gaudu wins third stage as Jonas Vingegaard retains overall lead
